description: AST nodes for templates, inheritance, enums, and advanced type system

nodes.name: EnumDecl
nodes.purpose: Represents an enum declaration (scoped or unscoped)
nodes.c_equivalent: C enum (unscoped) or enum with prefixed names (scoped)
nodes.translation_notes: Unscoped: direct mapping. Scoped: prefix constants with EnumName__.

nodes.name: EnumConstantDecl
nodes.translation_notes: For scoped enums, prefix with enum name.

nodes.name: CXXBaseSpecifier
nodes.purpose: Represents a base class in inheritance hierarchy
nodes.translation_notes: Embed base class struct as first field. Adjust field offsets.
nodes.example_c: struct Derived { struct Base base; /* derived fields */ };

nodes.name: ClassTemplateDecl
nodes.translation_notes: Monomorphization: create separate struct for each instantiation. Name: ClassName_T1_T2.
nodes.example_cpp: template<typename T> class Box { T value; };
nodes.example_c: struct Box_int { int value; }; struct Box_float { float value; };

nodes.name: FunctionTemplateDecl
nodes.translation_notes: Monomorphization: create separate function for each instantiation. Name: funcName_T1_T2.
nodes.example_cpp: template<typename T> T max(T a, T b);
nodes.example_c: int max_int(int a, int b); float max_float(float a, float b);

nodes.name: TemplateTypeParmDecl
key_methods: hasDefaultArgument() - True if has default type
used_for: Template type parameters (typename T, class T)
nodes.c_equivalent: Replaced with concrete type in monomorphization
nodes.translation_notes: Substitute with actual type during instantiation.

nodes.name: ClassTemplateSpecializationDecl
nodes.purpose: Represents an instantiation of a class template
nodes.inherits_from: CXXRecordDecl → RecordDecl → TagDecl → TypeDecl → NamedDecl → Decl
nodes.translation_notes: This is the result of monomorphization. Generate concrete struct.
nodes.example_c: struct Box_int { int value; }; struct Box_int intBox;

nodes.name: NamespaceDecl
key_methods: decls() - Iterator over declarations in namespace
nodes.translation_notes: Prefix all names with namespace: namespace_name_symbol_name.
nodes.example_cpp: namespace math { int add(int a, int b); }

nodes.name: QualType
nodes.purpose: Represents a type with qualifiers (const, volatile)
nodes.translation_notes: Preserve const/volatile qualifiers. Extract underlying type.

nodes.name: BuiltinType
nodes.purpose: Represents a built-in type (int, float, char, etc.)
key_methods: getKind() - Returns kind (Int, Float, Char, etc.)
getName() - Returns type name as string
nodes.example_c: int, float, double, int // bool -> int

nodes.name: PointerType
key_methods: getPointeeType() - Returns type being pointed to

nodes.name: ReferenceType
nodes.translation_notes: Convert references to pointers. T& -> T*.

nodes.name: RecordType
nodes.translation_notes: Map to C struct type. Use translated struct name.
